Description: Create a palm-sized globe of light at a targeted point in space. The globe gives off light to a 30 radius. It gives off dim light for another 30 foot radius. As an action or as part of their movement the caster can move the globe up to 30 feet per round.
Place a recording of your voice onto a physical object or location that will repeat it if activated with faez or a command word. The recording can be no longer than 30 seconds.
Escalation: Add an additional year of duration and 30 seconds for 1 FP. Or cast the spell at 5 FP to make it permanent and 2 minutes.

Description: Caster can see residue left by faez use up to 20 feet away. Left over magic will generally only stick around for a short time depending on the level of the spell. Residue will remain for 10 minutes per Faez Point spent.
Escalation: The caster can see slight color differences that show the different elements or spell type for 2 additional FP.

Description: Protect yourself from natural weather phenomena (cold, rain, wind, heat) that are not dangerous (hurricanes, sand storm, heat wave, deep frost, tornado, etc.).

Unless someone is actively looking for you, the player can move through crowded spaces without being noticed. Only works if there are other people around. If someone is actively looking for you, any perception checks are at disadvantage. If you are making a scene (casting a spell, or other physical action) it will ruin the effect.
Target can see in the dark up to 60 feet normally and another 30ft in dim light. Can only see in black and white.
Escalation: For 1 FP, increase range by 30 feet and duration by 1 hour.

Description: Create a small flame on your hand or other body part without causing injury to oneself. Can use for light, starting small fires, or cause pain but no damage to another target.
Caster selects up to 5 simultaneously touched items during casting. Those items’ colors change to any other color on the visible spectrum the caster wishes for the duration of the spell.

Take a small simple item less than 5lbs and no larger than a 1ft cube and transform it into another small simple item of a similar size (ex. - change a toothbrush into a sharp knife). The spell cannot dramatically change the value. The item must be in your possession. The transformation might introduce long term problems with the items.
Escalation: Can spend 1 point to increase the weight by 5lbs and the size by 0.5ft cube

Description: Shoot a 15 ft spray of flame in an 45 degree arc dealing 1d6 fire damage (Dex save for half). At level 6, 9, 12, and 15 damage increases by 1d6 damage.
Escalation: Can spend 1 point to increase damage by another 1d6 (Max 2)

Description: Give fire resistance.
Escalation: Can spend 1 additional point to give to another target

Description: The caster quickly alters the size and fit of the touched individual’s clothing as if they had been altered by a high-end tailor.
Escalation: Can spend 1 additional point to cause the touched clothing to restrain their wearer (STR save to rip free; DEX save to wiggle out). Duration decreases to 10 rounds.

Description: Flames encase casters hands and they can make melee attacks for normal punch damage plus 1d8 fire damage.
Escalation: Can spend 1 FP to increase damage by 1d8 (Max 1 increase).

Description: Shoot 3 rays from your hand. Must hit a target with a ranged spell attack. Each ray deals 2d8 damage.
Escalation: Can spend 1 additional point to add another ray and increase range by 20 feet (Max 2 increase).

Description: For the duration, players can take 1 additional action per turn. They also take 1d6 fire damage that cannot be resisted at the end of each of their turns. After the spell is over they gain a level of exhaustion for 5 rounds.
Repair small superficial or visible wounds like bruising or small cuts.
Roll a 1d8 to add to a skill check or ability check. Cannot cast multiple of the same attribute on one person. Can cast multiple spells of different abilities on the same person.

Lob a dirty water bulb with a ranged attack that if it hits the target, deals 1d6 damage and the target loses their reaction until the end of your next turn. At level 6, 9, 12, and 15, increase the number of targets by 1.
Escalation: Can spend 1 point to increase the number of targets by 1 (Max 2)

Description: When given an opportunity attack, caster can deliver a faez-charged slap dealing 1d6 water damage.  At level 6, 9, 12, and 15, increase the damage by 1d6.
Get a swim speed equal to your land speed.
Escalation: Can spend 1 point to increase swim speed by 20 feet

Description: Heal target 1d8 damage.
Escalation: Can spend 1 point to increase healing by 1d8 (Max 3)

Description: Heal target 1d6 damage.
Escalation: Can spend 1 point to increase healing by 1d6 (Max 3)

Description: When given an opportunity attack, or hit by a damaging attack (within 15ft), or the target fails a spell save (within 15ft), the caster can use their reaction to hit them with the Cursed Momentum spell. Target must make a DC STR Save or have their movement reduced by 50% for 2 rounds and take 1d8 water damage. If the target makes a save, they only take damage.
Escalation: Can spend 1 additional point to change to loss of movement and 2d8 damage. (Max 2)

Description: Increase AC by 2 and give 10 temporary hit points.
Escalation: Can spend 1 additional point to give to an additional target

Description: While this spell is active, player can cast spells as a reaction that normally require an action or bonus action. They can use these spells either as an opportunity attack, if they are damaged by an attack (max 15ft range), or an enemy fails their spell save (max 15ft range). The player also heals 1d4 damage at the end of each of their turns during the duration. Players still have to meet requirements for a reaction to use it.
When hit by an attack, gain resistance to that attack (50% damage down) and move up to 15 feet.

Send a 30 word or less message to someone known by the caster. Must know the general location and cannot be blocked by a sealed container. The message is spoken and transported through the air into their ear.
Caster creates a 30-foot area breeze centered on a target until dismissed. Breeze can be light or powerful enough to blow around items under a weight of 0.5 pound.

Call up winds to batter a large or smaller target. The target loses their bonus action, movement is halved, and must make an DC STR Save or be knocked prone. Intimidation checks versus this opponent are made at advantage for 1 hour afterwards.
Shoot a dart of compacted wind at a target to deal 1d10 damage upon hit (ranged attack). At level 6, 9, 12, and 15, increase the number of wind dart targets by 1.
Escalation: Can spend 1 point to increase the number of targets by 1 (Max 2).

Description: Jump triple normal jumping distance.
Target must make a DC STR Save or take 3d6 + Air FE damage and be knocked prone. Save reduces the damage by half.
Escalation: Spend 1 FP to increase damage by 1d6.

Description: Caster gains 4 movement actions this round.
Move all willing and/or friendly targets up to 10 feet then deal 4d8 damage to all targets in a 20’ by 20’ area from materials swept up in squall level winds. Dex save for half.
Escalation: Can spend 1 additional point to increase damage by 2d8 (Max 1)

Description: Increase speed by 20 feet and create a 10 ft radius field of whirling debris around the caster. Anyone caught in, entering, or starting its turn in the field takes 3d10 damage (DEX save for half). Caster does not provoke opportunity attacks.
Escalation: Can spend 1 additional point to increase damage by 2d10 (Max 1)

Description: Call a dangerous storm (20-foot-radius, 40-foot-high cylinder). Each creature must make a Dexterity saving throw. Takes 5d10 lightning damage on a failed save (half on success). If a damage die is a 10, creature must make a Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
Escalation: Can spend 1 additional point to increase damage by 2d10 (Max 1)

Description: Until the end of your next turn, you have resistance against bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage by non-magical weapon attacks.
Repair a simple object or machine (sewing machine, bicycle, etc.)
Shoot a dense rock at a target dealing 1d6 damage upon hit (ranged attack). Critical range is lower by 1. At level 6, 9, 12, and 15 increase the number of targets by 1.
Escalation: Can spend 1 point to increase number of targets by 1 (Max 2)

Description: Increase AC by 2.

Duration: Until long rest, or ward is consumed
Description: Caster gains +4 AC versus bullets, and the first time they are damaged by a bullet, they take no damage and the ward is consumed.

Using common materials, create a homunculus (5 HP, 20 lbs, 1 ft tall) that is psychically connected to the caster (up to 200 ft). Can speak for the caster, carry small objects (< 2 lbs), or be used as a scout. Cannot easily deal damage.
Escalation: Can spend 1 additional point to increase duration by 1 hour.

Description: Shoot a dense ball of earthen magic at the target dealing 5d6 damage upon hit with a ranged attack. Target must make a CON save or be stunned for 1 round.
Escalation: Can spend 1 additional point to increase damage by 2d6 (Max 1).

Description: During the duration of the spell, the target can have up to 2 active auras.

You have resistance against bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage by non-magical and magical weapon attacks. Critical attacks against you are treated as non-critical attacks. Critical range for your attacks reduced by 1.
Escalation: Can spend 1 additional point to increase duration to 4 hours.

Description: Remember a piece of trivia or fact that you once knew. Cannot be information that you are not consciously aware of or did not intend to remember.
The caster has a flash of insight and suddenly knows one useless fact or one thing that will happen to someone somewhere that will not directly affect the caster.
Reveal elemental information about target item (less than 200 lbs) and other useful arcane information about its history. Gain advantage if an Arcane, or other similar knowledge check is required.

Shoot a bolt of force energy at a target dealing 1d6 damage upon hit (ranged attack) and push target back 5 feet. +2 to hit for all force bolt attacks. At level 6, 9, 12, and 15, increase number of targets by 1.
Escalation: Can spend 1 point to increase number of targets (Max 3)

Duration: Until the end of the next round
Description: Create force pads to quickly climb to a higher elevation, or cross an open span; can reach 30 feet high (maximum 45 degree angle) or 60 feet long.
Escalation: Can spend 1 point to climb another 20 feet higher or 30 feet longer

Description: Roll 2 d20s and save the results. At any time, you can replace your or an enemy’s d20 dice roll with one of these saved dice.
Escalation: Can spend 1 additional point for another d20

Description: Caster creates an invisible wall of force up to 100 square feet. Outer side forces STR save or target is pushed 10 feet and takes 1d6 physical damage if they impact a solid surface. Inner side allows targets to choose to be pushed 10 feet (no damage).
Escalation: Spend 1 FP to increase square footage of the wall by 50ft

Description: All creatures caught in the force wave take 5d6 damage. All creatures must make a STR save or be pushed back 10 feet and knocked prone. Making the save takes half damage but is not pushed or knocked prone.
Escalation: Can spend 1 additional point to increase damage by 2d6 and pushed back 5 more feet (Max 1)

Description: While active, caster rolls advantage on all attacks, checks, and saving throws. They do not provoke opportunity attacks and reroll all 1s for attacks, checks, and damage. Caster can spend 1 FP to cast a spell that normally requires an action as a bonus action.
Create a divining apparatus. Describe or name an object or creature familiar to you. The apparatus points you unerringly to the object or creature as long as it is within 1,000 feet of you.
Escalation: Can spend 1 additional point to increase distance the apparatus can pick up to 2,500 feet.

Description: With a successful melee hit, target takes 1d6 electricity damage. They must roll a DC CON save or drop anything they are currently holding.
Create a barely visible shimmering shield around your body that gives you an increased AC of 2. When hit by melee, can use a reaction to deal 2d6 force damage and push target back 10 feet.
Gain advantage versus poisons, ability to eat any disgusting non-dangerous foods without revulsion, and keep yourself from vomiting.

Range: 5 feet radius, or one big plant
Description: Touch any plant or green area to improve growth or keep it from falling ill. Can only have 1 active.
Create a realistic sound of thunder in range.
Escalation: Spend 1 Faez Point to increase volume, potentially startling anyone not ready. DC CON save or lose bonus action and halve speed for next round.

Description: Anticipate a single nearby enemy to give them disadvantage on opportunity attacks and increase your movement speed by 10 feet.
Gain resistance versus cold, ignore difficult terrain if it’s ice or an icy surface, and unarmed attacks can be cold or bludgeoning damage.
Lob a fiery rock at a target dealing 1d6 fire damage and 1d6 bludgeoning damage. Everyone within 5 feet takes 1d6 fire damage.
Escalation: Spend 1 additional faez point to increase damage by 1d6 for all fire damage.

Description: Target must succeed a DC Dex save or have fiery bracelets on their ankles which cause 1d4 fire damage each turn and reduce their speed by half. Save only reduces speed until end of next turn. Target can save at end of successive rounds.
Removes the physical and mental effects of alcohol from the caster.
Escalation: Can spend 1 point to target someone other than the caster.

Description: Jump up to 15 feet without triggering opportunity attacks. Upon landing, fire erupts causing 1d6 fire damage to any adjacent individuals who fail a Dex save.
Target is surrounded by 10’ radius grasping vines. All creatures in the zone must make a DC DEX save or become immobilized. The area becomes difficult terrain. New save at end of next turn.
Escalation: Can spend 1 additional faez point to increase DC save by 2.

Description: Target makes an INT save. On a failure, they forget the language of the caster’s choice. This does not affect spell casting.
Escalation: Can spend 1 point each to target another person beyond the first for each point spent.

Description: Gain a 10 feet movement bonus, +2 AC, and do not provoke opportunity attacks. As a bonus action, you can move up to your max speed.
Lob an acid blob at target dealing 1d6 upon hit (ranged attack); target takes an additional 1d6 damage the following turn unless they use a bonus action (or action) to clean off the acid.
Escalation: Can spend 1 point to increase initial damage by another 1d6

Description: Target makes a CHA check. If they fail, they become much more talkative than they would like to be.
Escalation: Can spend 1 point to target 3 individuals.

Description: Target makes a CON save. On failure, their fingers cannot be used for spells or weapons. Target gets another CON save at the end of each of their turns.

Duration: 10 minutes or until sprites are gone
Description: Caster gains five force sprites that float around them. Each sprite gives +1 AC (total +5 AC). For each time the caster is missed by an attack that would have hit, they lose 1 sprite and their AC goes down by 1.
A flaming spear is hurled at the target and upon hit (ranged attack) takes 2d8 fire damage.
Escalation: Can spend 1 point to increase damage by 1d8 and range by 50 feet.

Description: Target enemy must make a DC CON save or take 1d8 fire damage and then drop the metal (or heat-holding) item in their hands.

Target makes a STR save. On a failure, they gain a fly speed of 20 and move erratically for the duration of their turn (DM determines path). New STR save at end of each turn. Target does not take crash damage from this spell.
Target is not affected by difficult terrain or speed reduction. Cannot be paralyzed or restrained by spell effects (physical restraining can still occur). Increase speed by 10 feet.
Escalation: Can spend 1 additional point to give to another target

Description: A faint ghostly crown forms on your head. Can mentally connect with the Internet to ask search-engine questions (only works where Internet is active). Also get advantage on all knowledge checks.
Choose a humanoid. Target must succeed on a WIS or STR saving throw or be encoated in a shield of ice for the duration. New save at end of each turn.
Escalation: Can spend 1 point each to target another person beyond the first for each point spent.

Description: When given an opportunity attack, or damaged by an enemy (range 15ft), or an enemy fails a spell save (range 15ft), the caster may hit the target with an acid jet which deals 5d6 fire damage and reduces their movement by half for the rest of their turn.
Target must make a DC CHA save or become soul scorched. Failure takes 6d8 spirit damage and cannot heal for the next 3 rounds. Success takes half damage.
Escalation: Spend 1 FP to increase damage by 2d8 (Max 1)

Description: Target enemy is coated in a sheen of glistening ice. They take 1d6 cold damage every turn. If they move (forced movement doesn't count), ice hardens: takes another 1d6 cold damage for every 10 feet traveled and must make a DC CON save or become incapacitated. New save at end of each turn if incapacitated.

Caster grows two thorny vines that act as separate limbs (hold objects/weapons). Gain unarmed proficiency for vines (uses spell ability for attack bonus). Damage: 2d6 + spell bonus modifier. Range 10 feet. Attack takes an action. Gain advantage on athletics and acrobatics checks and an additional free object interaction.
Escalation: Can spend 1 FP during your turn to make a second attack with the vines (Max 1).

Description: Conjure a 30 ft radius field of Veil mist around you. Ask up to 3 questions to spirits/Veil creatures. Gain advantage on Insight or Occult checks. Non-Veil beings in the mist make CHA saving throws at disadvantage.

A 20’ by 20’ cloud forms around target area, obscuring vision. Deals 4d6 thunder damage every turn. Casters roll disadvantage on concentration checks. Attempting to move requires a DC CON saving throw or be immobilized for the rest of the turn.

Faint mist covers caster (hard to detect). Move in lightly obscured mist, roll advantage on stealth checks. Melee attack from stealth: target takes damage as if they have vulnerability. Spell attacks from stealth make target roll disadvantage for spell saves. Effects last 1 additional turn if concentration is dropped.

Target Veil being must make a DC WIS spell save. Success: 2d6 spirit damage and cannot move for 1 round. Failure: 2d6 spirit damage and incapacitated until spell ends. Takes 2d6 spirit damage at beginning of additional turns. New save at end of additional turns.
In a 30 feet arc, blast electricity for 6d8 electrical damage to anyone in range with half damage on a DC DEX save.
Escalation: Can spend 1 additional point increase damage by 2d8 (Max 1)

Description: A 30’ by 30’ field grows rocky spikes. Anyone caught in the field must make a DEX save or take 4d6 piercing and 4d6 fire damage (half on save). Moving through field takes 1d6 fire damage for every 10 feet traveled. Field is difficult terrain.
Escalation: Can spend 1 additional point to increase piercing and fire damage by 1d6 (Max 1)

Description: Caster is healed 1d6 damage, receives a temporary shield of 1d4 HP, can move up to 30 feet as a bonus action, gains +4 AC until the end of the next round, and creates a 5 ft radius location of difficult terrain.
Target must make a DC CON save or take 1d6 damage. If the save is failed, caster gains health equal to the damage.

Target makes a CON save. On failure, their mouth is filled with small colorful beans. Target gets another CON save at the end of each turn. If target saves and knows combination, they can make an INT save to re-cast the spell on another target (duration restarts).

In a 30 ft sq area, everyone must make a DC WIS save or believe the ground is lava. Failure: take 3d6 psychic damage, move as if in difficult terrain, give advantage on all opportunity attacks, and must immediately move out. End turn in field: take 2d6 psychic damage.
Target electrical object is trapped with a magical explosive (4d6 electrical damage, DC Dex save for half) that detonates when a simple, pre-set trigger occurs.

Target unconscious humanoid is placed in a protective force shield (4 AC, 30 HP damage shield) and heals 1 HP per round. They wake at >10 HP, and are freed at full HP, when dismissed, or when they damage the shell from the inside.
Magical ghostly truncheon forms in fist. Gain proficiency and +2 to hit. Deals 2d6+2 damage. Target must roll a DC CON save or become frightened (cannot be affected again for 24 hours if saved).
Escalation: Caster may spend 1 Faez Point to make a second attack during the round.

Description: Boots grant +20 ft movement, ignore plant/natural difficult terrain, double jump distance, advantage on sneak checks, and resistance to plant based damage. If knocked unconscious, shift 30 ft away and heal 5 HP, but spell ends.

Target enemy must make a DC CON saving throw. Save: not restrained, takes half damage. Failure: wrapped in fiery chains, take 5d6 fire damage, and are restrained. Can save again at end of next turn. If chains remain, take 2d6 fire damage.

On a successful ranged attack, target is dealt 2d6 fire damage, immobilized with ice for 1 round, all attacks against it are at advantage for rest of combat, pushed back 10 feet (optional), and take another 2d6 bludgeoning damage.
Target must make a DC CON save or suffer rapid growth of bone spurs. Causes 6d6 damage, movement reduced by half, and any new CON saves are made at a disadvantage (half damage/no effects on a save).
Target enemy must make a DC CHA saving throw or they will roll at disadvantage on all CHA based saving throws or skill checks while spell is maintained. Counts as a charm.
Enemies in a 30 ft radius area with less than 50 HP total are pulled to the center by ghostly chains and are restrained (no save).
Escalation: Spend 1 Faez Point to add 1d8 air damage per round

Description: Target enemy must make a DC CON save. Save: 2d8 fire damage but no transformation. Failure: target begins to transform, is incapacitated and takes 2d8 fire damage each turn. If they save before dying, they take an equal number of turns to turn back, taking 2d8 fire damage each time.

Caster gains fire resistance and +2 AC. Any enemy entering a 10 feet radius or starting turn in aura takes 2d6 fire damage. Caster may use an opportunity attack to lash out with a flame whip dealing 3d6 fire damage.

The caster designates four spots on the battlefield within range where soulfire sentinels are created. They look like pale flames that flicker and dance in place. The sentinels create a region of difficult terrain only for enemies in a range of 10 feet radius. During the duration of the spell, as an opportunity attack if the enemy moves past one of the sentinels, the caster can use a reaction to make a ranged attack against any enemy in range of a soulfire sentinel dealing 4d8 fire damage and causing the enemy to end its movement. Soulfire sentinels have an attack range of 10 feet. At any time during the duration, the caster can use an action to detonate a single sentinel dealing 4d8 spirit damage (Dex Save for half) in a 10 ft radius.
Target gains DR2 and rolls advantage on spell saves. Enemies attacking the target must make a DC INT save or take 2d8 air damage.
Escalation: Spend 1 FP to add an additional touch target (Max 1).

Description: Creates a 15 ft radius region drawing Veil energy. Anyone besides caster must roll a DC WIS save or become frightened. Non-Veil creatures take 1d8 spirit damage per turn. Caster can move domain 30 feet as a bonus action. Veil creatures roll attacks/checks at advantage.

Cures a single friendly target of most negative effects (Immobility, speed reduction, stuns immediately dispelled). Target immediately gets to save again for all other negative effects. Target is healed 3d8 damage.

Caster creates a 20 ft radius patch of magical darkness that only they can see through. Enemies are blind and must roll a DC INT save to move at half speed (immobilized if fail). Ranged targets treated as in total cover.
Escalation: Spend 1 FP to increase the radius by 10 feet (Max 1).

Description: Target must either stay stationary or move entire movement in a straight line. Multiple attacks: single miss means all attacks miss. Attacker targeting cursed: single hit means all attacks hit.

Figure made of spirit motes (HP are half caster's) appears. Uses caster's reaction to impose disadvantage on creature attacking player within 30 feet. Half of damage dealt to player is prevented, taken by guardian, and dealt back to attacker.
Caster’s skin raises or lowers to a temperature they find most pleasing (nice tingling feeling). Any adverse temperature or weather causes this spell to fail.
Caster holds a ceramic mug (or pieces), speaks the incantation, and the mug is completely fixed. A small, stylized ‘R’ is etched into the bottom.
Choose a sound-related focus and a 20ft radius area. The next time an entity makes sound in the area, a sound file (up to 10 minutes) will be listenable on the focus.
Escalation: Can spend one point to increase audio sensitivity or create audio for next 10 unique entities.

Description: Choose a visual focus (glass ball, unpowered screen, etc.), a point in space, and a perspective. The next time an entity crosses through the perspective, an image will be viewable on the focus.
Escalation: Can spend one point to increase resolution or create image for next 10 unique entities.

Description: The exterior of caster’s body and items carried or worn become completely waterproof.

Caster casts a protective ward on their Companion that creates a health link. Any damage received by the Companion will be transferred to the player (area of effect damage hits player double). Bond is severed if player dies.
Caster casts the protective ward on their Companion, giving them an increased AC2 and DR2.
Companion receives 10 temporary hit points (high companions) or 2 temporary hit points (low companions). Companion receives +2 to attack rolls and +2 AC.
After a flash of flame/embers, your entire wardrobe is transformed into a new version (cannot provide any bonuses that were not already part of the outfit).
Heal target 1d6 damage.
The next spell you cast that may not have a trigger based on a person/creature now only affects or is triggered by the particular person or creature chosen.
Escalation: Can spend one point to increase number of particular people or creatures by one for each point spent.

Description: Choose a sound-related focus and a 20ft radius area. The next time an entity makes sound in the area, that sound will be played/amplified through the focus for 10 minutes.
Escalation: Can spend one point to increase audio sensitivity or extend sound being played for full duration of spell.

Description: Caster may take another action this turn.
Reduce crit range for this player by 1.
Heal self 5d6 damage, eliminate any poisons, and give yourself a 10 temporary hit point shield.
For every 10 feet player has moved this turn, add an additional 1d6 air damage to the next attack.
Caster rolls advantage on their next attack, rerolls 1s on damage dice, and if the attack fails to hit the target, they get advantage on their next attack.
Caster’s shoes/feet cause water to freeze underneath them to support weight. Water thaws normally when caster moves. Movement speed limited to 20ft per round on the ice.
Escalation: Spend 1 more FE to be able to move safely on the ice at full speed.

Description: Tame a non-intelligent creature. Animal will only do a few simple things: Move away, Stand still, or Follow me.
Escalation: For 1 each additional FP point, include 1 additional medium (or corresponding smaller numbers)

Description: Target window or other see-through object becomes tinted or obscured, making it no longer see-through.

Target’s shoes/feet become slippery. Can move across slick surfaces (ice, grease, etc.) at twice normal speed. On normal surfaces, move an ** additional 10 feet** in the same direction at end of planned movement.

Creates a large-sized swirling cyclone. Individuals must make a Strength save or be pushed out. Items < 5 lbs are blown about. Ranged attacks through the space are made at disadvantage (3/4 cover). Bonus action to move up to 15 feet.
Escalation: Can spend one point to increase size to huge.

Description: A 10 foot radius area of earth (not stone) or water (not ice) becomes thick mud.
Escalation: Can spend one point to increase radius to 30 foot.

Description: 2 Tentacles emerge from back. Can make unarmed attacks, lift up to 50 lbs each, squeeze through small holes, help climb, and help grapple. Visual aspect may affect others.
A privacy bubble forms around you (up to 10 feet radius). Blocks sound and obscures vision, preventing lip reading or other visual communication markers.
Target can see through basic illusions easily (like Look Away enchantments).
Escalation: Increase targets by 1.

Description: Two stones are enchanted as magical walkie-talkies that cannot be eavesdropped upon (range up to 1 mile).
Escalation: Spend 1 point to increase number of stones by 2.

Description: Increase speed by 50 feet for one round, move to a target, and make two melee attacks.
Escalation: Spend 1 additional FE to make both attacks at advantage.

Description: A swirling dust devil captures the target, forcing a DC STR saving throw. Failure: immobilized, cannot take bonus actions, and must make a DC CON save to take any actions. Save at the end of every round.

Target must make a DC Saving throw or be charmed. Charmed target will not harm anyone or do anything against their will, but can be convinced to accept normal decisions (e.g., getting a table, passing a guard). Failed save makes target hostile to caster.
Give a length of time, or trigger for when the electrical object or panel will either turn on or off.
All electronic lights in range create a powerful flash. Anyone in range must roll a Dex save or be blinded. Can reroll at the end of the next turn.
Touch a metal object to electrify it. Anyone who contacts it takes 2d6 electrical damage. Targeting metal on a living creature gives them advantage on the save to resist.
Escalation: Spend an additional 1 FE to increase damage by 1d8.

Description: Target gains a +2 AC versus bullets and a DR2 versus bullets.
An inanimate object (including a dead body) reveals any recent spells that affected it. Reveals elements and the originator (if in range). Information is available for 24 hours.
At the target location, a force explosion deals 6d6 force damage to everyone in a 20’ x 20’ area and knocks them prone (fail DC DEX save). Damage cut in half on a DC CON save.
Escalation: Spend 1 FP to increase damage by 2d6.

Description: Requires Concentration. Target gains a +4 AC versus bullets and a DR4 versus bullets.
Drill a 5x5 tunnel 15 feet into mundane stone.
Escalation: Can spend one point to increase to 25 feet.

Description: Air pressure within the ground erupts. 20 foot radius becomes difficult terrain. Individuals roll a Dex check or are dealt 8d6 thunder/sonic damage and are pushed 10 feet. Success reduces damage by half (2nd STR save for no movement + full damage).
Escalation: Can spend one point to increase damage to 10d6.

Description: Enchantment placed on location with a trigger. Upon trigger, target makes a Dex save. Failure: target is trapped and shrunken into a 2’x1’ cage (demi-realm). Can be recast to keep target caged (new save with each recast).
The item touched must be natural and translucent (Amber, jewels, obsidian, etc.). A specific individual is named. When that individual is within 30 feet of the item, the item glows.
Plants in the range of the spell can offer ** information about anything that happened in the area for the last 24 hours**.
Summon two jackal-headed warriors made of shadow that will fight for you (basic instructions: fight, defend, find, etc.). See Shadow Warrior in Friends & Foes.
Escalation: Spend 1 additional FP to make a third shadow warrior.

Description: Ultimate Fire Control. Sheathed in flame. Melee attackers take 2d6+ability mod fire damage. Flammable ranged projectiles burn up (no damage). Temperature reaches 1,500°F (occupied area) / 600°F (10 ft radius)—objects may melt/ignite. Melee attacks deal +4d6 fire damage. Air spells targeting you must be Air 5+. Expending duration: Create a 25ft cone of flame dealing 12d6 fire damage (Dex Save).

Ultimate Earth Control. Surrounded by earthen crust. Immune to physical damage. Melee attacks deal +4d6 earth damage. Can choose to be immovable. Deal triple damage to structures/inanimate objects. Fire spells targeting you must be Fire 5+. Expending duration: Create a 25ft cone of rocks dealing 12d6 bludgeoning/force damage (Dex Save).

Ultimate Water Control. Body becomes fluid. May make a Dex save (DC=attack roll) against each attack to 'flow' out of harm's way. Melee attacks deal +4d6 piercing damage. Can move through any opening up to 1 inch wide. Occupied space may be 6 contiguous 5x5 spaces. Earth spells targeting you must be Earth 5+. Expending duration: Create a 25ft cone of water dealing 12d6 piercing/force damage (Dex Save).

Ultimate Air Control. All attacks made at you have a 50% chance of failure to make contact. Melee attacks deal +4d6 slashing damage. Have a fly speed of 50ft. May choose to roll a natural 20 on stealth checks. Water spells targeting you must be Water 5+. Expending duration: Create a 25ft cone of pressurized air dealing 12d6 slashing/force damage (Dex Save).

Caster attempts to enter the dream of a sleeping target. Target must be unaware or willingly allow it. Caster witnesses the dream. To direct the dream towards a specific topic, the dreamer makes a DC 12 Wisdom save to resist.
Calm a creature (beast, monstrosity, animal) not to attack or flee. Must be CR less than player level minus two. Any damage ends the effect.
Escalation: Spend 1 point to increase CR by 2 (can spend multiple).

Description: Create a magical force shield up to 10 feet away. If near self, add +4 AC. If further, shield may stop forward movement of small creature that runs into it.
Escalation: Spend 1 point to increase size of creature stopped by one level.

Description: Fingernails grow into razor sharp blades. Unarmed attacks become 1d6 slashing damage.
Increase speed by 30 feet per round.
Escalation: Spend 1 point to change cast time to a reaction upon being attacked in melee.

Description: Target must make a WIS DC check save or be stunned for 1 round.
Escalation: Spend 1 point to increase DC by 2 (can spend multiple).

Description: Target must make a WIS DC check save or be stunned for 1 round and take 1d8 force damage.
Escalation: Spend 1 point to increase DC by 2 and damage by 1d8 force damage (can spend multiple).

Requirement: Water 3 / Fire 3 / WIS 12 OR Aura Healers
Description: Heal target 2d4 damage.
Escalation: Spend 1 FP to increase healing by 2d4.

Requirement: Aura Healers OR WIS 15, Water 5, Spirit 4
Description: Any healing spell you cast gains an additional 1d4 of healing.

Requirement: Aura Healers OR WIS 15, Water 5, Spirit 4
Description: Any ally within 30 feet rolls 1d4 for WIS checks.

Requirement: Aura Healers OR WIS 15, Water 5, Spirit 4
Description: Roll advantage on any grapple checks.
If the target has fallen below zero hit points, or has died within the last minute, the mark of the phoenix will bring them back to 10 hit points.
The two recipients are linked by the sigil. They can pass messages, sense what’s happening, and any damage they take is shared equally.
A quickly invisible sigil is drawn. Gives +2 perception, +2 initiative, and advantage on rolls for skill checks during combat.
Invisible sigil placed on a location. If the specific "trigger" is met (condition understood by spell), the sigil explodes for 4d8 force damage in a 20 ft radius.
Turns a small metal object into a miniature screen displaying what an invisible eye can see (eye placed within 30 ft, moves with caster, can be relocated).
Touch an electrical outlet to completely shut down all electricity in range for the duration.

Requirement: Air 7 / Earth 2 / Dex 15 OR Stone Singers
Description: Stone beneath target explodes with sharp rock shards, dealing 4d8 bludgeoning and piercing damage.
Escalation: Increase FP cost by 1 for an additional 2d8 damage. Can only escalate twice.

Description: Choose a visual focus, point, and perspective. The next time an entity crosses, a 'video' (up to 10 minutes) is viewable on the focus.
Escalation: Can spend one point to increase resolution or create image for next 10 unique entities.

Description: Choose a visual focus, point, and perspective. The next time an entity crosses, a 'video' WITH SOUND (up to 10 minutes) is viewable on the focus.
Escalation: Can spend one point to increase resolution or create image for next 10 unique entities.

Description: Targeted area surrounded by ghostly runes. If any individual crosses the threshold, the caster will be mentally notified.
Escalation: Can spend 1 additional point to increase the duration to 24 hours.

Description: Caster or area surrounded by ghostly runes. Anyone who enters or makes a successful attack against protected individual makes a Strength save. Failure: 1d10 ice damage and pushed away 10 feet.
Escalation: Spend 1 additional point to increase damage by 1d10. Spend 1 additional to target an individual other than the caster.

Description: Caster or area surrounded by ghostly runes. Anyone who enters or attacks protected individual makes a Dex save. Failure: 1d10 fire damage and set on fire (2d6 fire damage at end of turn). Action to put out flames.
Escalation: Spend 1 additional point to increase the initial damage by 1d10. Spend 1 additional to target an individual other than the caster.

Description: Targeted area looks slightly askew. Targeting attacks made that pass through the boundary are made at disadvantage.
Escalation: Can spend 1 additional point to increase the duration to 24 hours.

Description: Caster looks slightly askew. Ranged attacks are made at disadvantage.
Escalation: Can spend 1 additional point to increase the duration to 1 hour. Can spend 1 additional to target an individual other than the caster.

Description: Ritual (1-2 mages). Requires a summoning circle (Low). Checks: DC 13 Dex, DC 15 Con, DC 12 Fire. Failure: Take 2d8 fire damage, and the Imp is loose and attempts to kill the caster. Success: Caster may ask the Imp up to 3 questions that it will answer if known (Imps are notorious secret hounds), OR the Imp may help the caster with a physical or arcane problem for up to 1 hour.

Ritual (1-3 mages). Requires a spectral field (Master of the Veil). Checks: DC 12 Int, DC 14 Earth. Failure: Take 1d8 earth damage, and the Veil Walker refuses the summons. Success: Caster summons a Veil Walker which can answer questions about someone who has died in the last month. The walker may interact with them or go back into the Veil for information before returning.

Ritual (1-3 mages). Requires a summoning circle (Low). Checks: DC 14 Int, DC 14 Spirit. Failure: Ritualists have -1 to all checks until a long rest. Success: Target caster (must be a ritualist) will gain 3 luck rolls to be used before a long rest (may replace any attack, skill, or ability check).

Ritual (1-3 mages). Requires a summoning circle (Low). Checks: DC 14 Fire, DC 14 Earth. Failure: All ritualists take 1d8 damage and lose an additional FE point. Success: Target caster (must be a ritualist) gains +2 AC, +2 to hit and damage for melee attacks, and gains 15 temporary hit points.

Ritual (1-3 mages). Requires a summoning circle (Low). Checks: DC 14 Air, DC 14 Earth. Failure: All ritualists lose 10 feet of movement per round for the rest of the day. Success: Target caster (must be a ritualist) gains 20 additional feet of speed, advantage on DEX rolls, and increased jumping distance by 50%.
